column1: Law enforcement continues to be one of the most dangerous jobs in America. In 2019 alone we lost 134 officers in the line of the duty - including two in KY. Thank you to those brave men and women who died protecting us and to those who continue to protect us. #BackTheBlue https://t.co/7vocOMaM63

I'm relieved that no Americans were killed or harmed during Tuesday night's attacks by the Iranian regime. As we learn more about the situation @realDonaldTrump continues to have my full support in ensuring Iran is held accountable. https://t.co/PIugl4ylJ4

Looking back on 2019 I am reminded of all the blessings for which I am grateful. From my family to yours I want to wish you a happy new year full of continued blessings and prosperity. #HappyNewYear https://t.co/HKLVnsbPjh

Today I look forward to celebrating the birth of our Lord and Savior with my family. Tomorrow and in the days ahead I look forward to getting back to work for you and our Commonwealth. From my family to yours wishing you a very Merry Christmas! #MerryChristmas https://t.co/5FJdJahg5l
I just want to take a moment to wish all those celebrating a very Happy Hanukkah! https://t.co/xExmcep1IN

This morning I filed to run for re-election. We are accomplishing a lot even in the minority and we have more work to do. When it comes to representing our values and advancing a conservative agenda I’m all in. https://t.co/fdw34Yu6rm
On this day of infamy we remember the 2403 Americans who died during the attack on #PearlHarbor. We will never forget. https://t.co/6HPbhDMHdC

Without any proof that @POTUS did anything wrong Nancy Pelosi is ordering House Democrats to move forward with Articles of Impeachment. Send them a message that it's time to focus on the real issues - not a political witch hunt - by adding your name now! https://t.co/3Cb6Ltl41z

More Americans are rejecting the Left's’ partisan impeachment sham. After 3 years of trying to overturn the 2016 election it is no surprise they are now trying to do the same ahead of 2020. We must keep the pressure on the Dems to abandon this witch hunt. https://t.co/AfDOS8mgPe

I have a lot to be thankful for this year including my happy and healthy family. But I’m also grateful that God has provided us such a beautiful country to live in. I hope you’ll join me in reflecting on all of the blessings we have. Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/VuoUB5F1ZH

It's become clear that the Democrats are using the partisan impeachment sham as a way to throw @POTUS out of office before the 2020 elections. In other words they're abusing their power just to deny you a choice next year. https://t.co/CgRNgTh0eK

Today is the beginning of the Left’s fake impeachment hearings against @POTUS. This sham is about denying YOU a vote in 2020 & crippling our agenda to Keep America Great. Help us send a message that it’s time to end these hearings by chipping in now! https://t.co/J8Me0vFdrJ https://t.co/DNpN42ffmV

I am always in awe of the bravery and sense of duty that our men and women in uniform possess. On this #VeteransDay please join me in thanking them for their sacrifice and dedication to protecting our American values. My God bless them! https://t.co/0EWGL803jf

I applaud @POTUS' decision to withdraw from the disastrous Paris climate deal. The U.S. is already a global leader in reducing carbon emissions and this deal only threatens our economy and fails to keep high-polluting countries like China accountable. https://t.co/i8iqPk2mYV
Today is #ElectionDay in Kentucky! Have you made plans to vote? Remember to find your polling location now and make your voice heard by voting Republican before 6pm. #VoteKY https://t.co/4NkriOSyxN

The Democrats are trying to legitimize their sham impeachment inquiry today but we're not going to let them win. Help us show that Kentucky has President Trump's back by adding your name now! https://t.co/hE2oogMrwR

Pelosi is more interested in playing political games to obstruct @POTUS's agenda than she is in leading the House. Her campaign for impeachment is yet another move in that game much to the detriment of the American people & their priorities. https://t.co/8aOHIAYTIy
Rep. Jim Jordan joined the @LelandShow while he was in town to talk about the Democrats' phony and baseless impeachment inquiry. Give it a listen here: https://t.co/n8SYTRnxUN

Thankful to my friend Rep. Jim Jordan for visiting Lexington. In Congress we've worked together to advance President Trump's agenda & we're now united against the Democrats' reckless impeachment charade. Watch our joint interview with Spectrum News: https://t.co/BY3kDrnBod

Thanks to @POTUS-GOP pro-growth policies the U.S. economy continues to thrive! Unemployment is now at its lowest level since 1969 with employers adding 136K new jobs in September. https://t.co/dxKg2ZuI5L https://t.co/DL4WiJfS33

It was an honor to welcome my friend Rep. Jim Jordan to Kentucky for the Franklin County Republican Party’s Reagan Dinner on Monday. He fired up the crowd and shared why it's so vital that we take back control of the House in 2020. https://t.co/kEprD2flXc https://t.co/VlapaELNqf

After more than 230 years our Constitution still serves as our guide to a more perfect union. On this #ConstitutionDay please join me in reading the words of our Founders and reflecting on the blessings of liberty we enjoy. https://t.co/Qr6jVBpDuH

18 years ago we promised to never forget the 2977 people who perished in New York City Washington D.C. and Pennsylvania. Today we renew that promise and thank the first responders who risked their own lives that day. #NeverForget https://t.co/C6rgHaChOR

The U.S. added 195K new jobs in August with more than 1M added in 2019 so far! This is great news for American workers who are also keeping more of their paycheck thanks to Republican tax cuts and pro-growth policies. https://t.co/Ldftg40IPe

American grit and hard work have led the way since our humble beginning turning us into the greatest country in the world. Today we celebrate the people who put in the hours to continue our progress. Happy Labor Day! https://t.co/yTMbCSIKTX

Bernie Sanders spent Sunday in Louisville pushing a far-left agenda that would kill thousands of jobs and undermine our way of life. I think I speak for Kentuckians when I say we don't support his Socialist agenda. https://t.co/TyKk8PSOPN

My friend and colleague @SteveScalise spoke with @NewsRadioWLAP yesterday to discuss Republican efforts to combat gun violence ensure our existing laws are enforced and hold law enforcement accountable for stopping would be mass shooters. Listen: https://t.co/mBPZFBxWRO

Thanks to @POTUS's pro-life leadership we're ensuring taxpayer funds won't be used for abortion procedures. Despite Planned Parenthood's claims that they don't use family planning funds for abortions today's news speaks volumes to their true priorities. https://t.co/4F5VcUpvgf

Not only is the American economy adding new jobs every month but working class wages are increasing at a fast rate as well. This is great news and why we must continue our conservative agenda of putting American workers first. https://t.co/KenDl64tUt

Border Patrol made more than 71K apprehensions at the border in July. While it's encouraging to see numbers going down the crisis is still a very real threat and DHS is warning that action is needed to further secure the border. https://t.co/REdezeeOce

The Democrats are scrambling to find ways to give away more of your hard-earned money and reduce incentives to succeed. Whether it's "free" money or overreaching government programs the result will be more taxes on the middle class. https://t.co/zRQE3r3YF1

Another solid jobs report for July! The Democrats running for office across the Commonwealth and the nation would have you believe our policies haven’t worked. In reality they’ve helped foster greater job creation & economic growth. It’s working. https://t.co/xq2RB3ft9i

Will you be watching the Dem Debates tonight and tomorrow? I can tell you what we'll see - more extreme positions cut from a liberal agenda of higher taxes big government socialism and extremest policies. https://t.co/uxPEHrafAv

Despite the unrelenting and dangerous obstruction from Democrats the border wall will be built. Last week's Supreme Court decision will finally allow us to secure the border help end the crisis and protect the American people. https://t.co/7nXeg8HZpI

The American economy continues to outperform expectations growing 2.1% last quarter! @POTUS's conservative pro-growth policies are putting America First and inspiring confidence among consumers. https://t.co/qXGpJzYbpS

Today's Mueller hearing is political theatre designed by the Democrats to get some negative quotes about the President. Instead of governing they're wasting time with these pointless probes. If you agree add your name now! https://t.co/T6oXJrYy5j

America is leading globally with our booming economy. @POTUS's conservative agenda has cut taxes strengthened our business environment and brought unemployment down to record low levels. Protecting this progress is why our success in 2020 remains vital! https://t.co/zX2AoCpqAt
50 years ago today America landed the first humans on the surface of the moon and inspired the world in the process. https://t.co/5KQaw76uEH

We're continuing to see incredibly strong economic numbers thanks to our pro-growth policies. In June America added 224000 new jobs increased labor force participation and kept unemployment low at 3.7%. President Trump's economic policies are working! https://t.co/eJmoLR2JvT

I sincerely hope you and yours are enjoying the blessings of freedom this Fourth of July. As you celebrate today please keep our veterans living and passed and their families in your prayers. https://t.co/gooPVGv4m2

Did you see tonight's second #DemDebate? Just like last night they embraced extreme far-left policies that will lead to even more government overreach and bankrupt the country. Take my survey to share which policies you most disagree with! https://t.co/TGkk0e4L1Z

Did you just see the #DemDebate? One thing is clear: their party is embracing an extreme far-left agenda. Which of Democrat policy proposals that you heard tonight do you most disagree with? Take my survey now >> https://t.co/TGkk0e4L1Z

.@POTUS wants to enforce our immigration laws and Nancy Pelosi's response is "What is the point?" The point is we have a crisis going on across the country and the Democrats refuse to uphold the rule of law. https://t.co/Cej2aipmtX

I applaud @POTUS for setting new sanctions against Iran in response to their recent provocations. My hope is our allies will join us in putting pressure on this dangerous regime. https://t.co/VVrYBwgVXc

Customs and Border Patrol is overwhelmed underfunded and fielding illegal border crossings of people from 52 different countries. While the Dems refuse to approve the emergency funding @POTUS requested the crisis gets worse and immigrants go unchecked. https://t.co/Y2GfXRKdz4
Americans agree: taxpayer money shouldn't be used to fund abortion providers and this week's decision from the 9th circuit court confirms that. A huge pro-life victory! https://t.co/nQV5Mlxs01

I never knew how rewarding being a dad would be but I consider it to be the best job I could ever ask for. Watching my girls grow up brings me an incredible sense of pride and joy. Happy #FathersDay to all Kentucky dads! https://t.co/Lgaf1lcTbS
Today we celebrate and proudly fly a symbol of freedom and strength. Happy #FlagDay! https://t.co/lQ0xrXDdYR

On this day 75 years ago more than 135000 Allied troops stormed the beaches of Normandy to liberate Europe from Nazi power forever changing the world. We're thankful for their bravery and sacrifice. #DDay https://t.co/8iwax05Jo7
Today we remember and honor those brave men and women who sacrificed it all for us. On behalf of my family have a happy and safe #MemorialDay! https://t.co/fn5tS1hGja
